name: AlpsNodeDesc
brief:
Node description holding subproblem-specific data

AlpsNodeDesc holds problem data for a tree node separate from tree
structure data. Users inherit this class for application-specific data.

**Design rationale:**
- AlpsTreeNode: Tree structure (parent, children, status)
- AlpsNodeDesc: Subproblem data (bounds, constraints, etc.)

This separation simplifies parallel communication: only the
description needs to be encoded for node transfer.

**Representation modes:**
- Explicit: Full problem data stored
- Relative: Differences from parent node
